dashboard.label: Welcome to the Goods Movements System Service App

div.p: This app is for GMS metrics

panel.title: Can I modify this app via the UI?

div.p: NO. This app is maintained by the Github and you MUST NOT try and modify it via the User Interface.

panel.title: What should I do if I want to modify this app?

div.p: Changes to this app are welcome but need to be done by the team who developed the app

panel.title: Who should I contact for any question about this app?

div.p: Any questions about this app should be directed to the app maintainer

panel.title: How do I view the dashboards

div.p: By selecting the drop down menu under the Dashboards heading and choosing the dashboard you want to view
